member.name: T:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.DataObjectExtensions
member.summary: Helper class for extraction of InstrumentKeys and ProductKeys from IDataObjects used with drag-and-drop and clipboard operations.

member.name: T:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.InstrumentExtensions
member.summary: Helper class for converting instances of Instruments to IDataObject, which can then be used for drag-and-drop and clipboard operations.

member.name: T:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.InstrumentKeyExtensions
member.summary: Helper class for converting instances of InstrumentKeys to IDataObject, which can then be used for drag-and-drop and clipboard operations.

member.name: T:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.ProductExtensions
member.summary: Helper class for converting instances of Products to IDataObject, which can then be used for drag-and-drop and clipboard operations.

member.name: T:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.ProductKeyExtensions
member.summary: Helper class for converting instances of ProductKeys to IDataObject, which can then be used for drag-and-drop and clipboard operations.

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.DataObjectExtensions.GetInstrumentKeys(System.Windows.IDataObject)
member.summary: Gets an array of InstrumentKey objects from an IDataObject

returns.para: Array of InstrumentKey objects or null if the object contained to instrument keys

member.param: IDataObject containing the objects dropped on the application window

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.DataObjectExtensions.GetProductKeys(System.Windows.IDataObject)
member.summary: Gets an array of ProductKey objects from an IDataObject

returns.para: Array of ProductKey objects or null if the object contained to product keys

member.param: IDataObject containing the objects dropped on the application window

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.DataObjectExtensions.HasInstrumentKeys(System.Windows.IDataObject)
member.summary: Checks whether a given IDataObject contains at least one InstrumentKey
member.returns: true if the IDataObject contains at least one InstrumentKey object; false, otherwise
member.param: IDataObject containing the objects dropped on the application window

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.DataObjectExtensions.HasProductKeys(System.Windows.IDataObject)
member.summary: Checks whether a given IDataObject contains at least one ProductKey
member.returns: true if the IDataObject contains at least one ProductKey object; false, otherwise
member.param: IDataObject containing the objects dropped on the application window

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.InstrumentExtensions.ToDataObject(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.Instrument})
member.summary: Converts a collection of Instrument objects to a IDataObject.
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: Collection of Instrument objects to copy to the system clipboard

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.InstrumentExtensions.ToDataObject(TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.Instrument)
member.summary: Converts an Instrument object to a IDataObject
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: Instrument object to copy to the system clipboard

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.InstrumentKeyExtensions.ToDataObject(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.InstrumentKey})
member.summary: Converts a collection of InstrumentKeys to IDataObject.
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: Collection of InstrumentKey objects to copy to the system clipboard

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.InstrumentKeyExtensions.ToDataObject(TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.InstrumentKey)
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: InstrumentKey object to copy to the system clipboard

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.ProductExtensions.ToDataObject(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.Product})
member.summary: Converts a collection of Products to IDataObject.
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: Collection of Product object to copy to the system clipboard

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.ProductExtensions.ToDataObject(TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.Product)
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: Product object to copy to the system clipboard

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.ProductKeyExtensions.ToDataObject(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.ProductKey})
member.summary: Converts a collection of ProductKeys objects to a IDataObject.
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: Collection of ProductKey objects to copy to the system clipboard

member.name: M:TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.WpfHelpers.ProductKeyExtensions.ToDataObject(TradingTechnologies.TTAPI.ProductKey)
member.summary: Converts a ProductKey object to a IDataObject.
member.returns: IDataObject object if successful; null, otherwise
member.param: ProductKey object to copy to the system clipboard
